div.p: Find warm Kashmiri hospitality at Conifer View Guest House
Tangmarg - Gateway to Gulmarg
30 minutes drive to gondola & skiing
4.3/5 on MakeMyTrip | 8.8/10 on Booking.com
Private on-site parking included
Traditional Kashmiri hospitality

Conifer View Guest House is a cozy mountain homestay in Tangmarg — the peaceful gateway to Gulmarg. Set on Iqbal Colony Road, the house offers warm Kashmiri hospitality, clean rooms, and views of pine-clad slopes.

It's a practical base for gondola rides, skiing in winter, and day trips to Drung Waterfall and Ningle Nallah. Our family-run guest house provides a "feel at home while away from home" experience with traditional Kashmiri warmth.
We ensure every guest receives personalized attention and assistance with local arrangements, making your Kashmir journey unforgettable.

div.p: Common questions about staying with us

div.button: How far is Conifer View from Gulmarg?

div.p: We are located 11-14 km from Gulmarg, which is approximately a 30-40 minute drive. This makes us the perfect base for day trips to the gondola and skiing areas while enjoying the peace of Tangmarg.
Yes, we provide free private on-site parking for all our guests. You don't need to worry about finding parking in Tangmarg.
Yes, we serve fresh in-room breakfast with multiple options including vegetarian, halal, and kosher meals. Experience authentic Kashmiri cuisine as part of your stay.

div.button: Do you help with local tours or gondola tickets?

div.p: Absolutely! Mohammad Imran Khan and our family assist with local arrangements, transportation, gondola tickets, and tour planning. We ensure your Kashmir experience is hassle-free and memorable.
